text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with homemade fresh butter that's
right we're going to do our own handmade

old-fashioned arm power so I'm gonna

two-thirds of the way full with very

amounts really don't matter as long as
you can shake screw on the lid and then
shake shake shake shake for 15 to 20
minutes you can definitely do this in a

know what I wanted to go old-school
alright this is like the original elbow
grease
get it elbow grease thank you very much
